resources.string: Welcome to credit shield this app was designed with the purpose of helping users gain different payment options when looking to pay off a large balance on their credit card. The apps design is meant to be used on dynamic balance that once paid should be reset not to manage credit purchases over extended period of time.
Min pay mode allows users to see how their balances will look over the course of a year had they only paid minimum amount due on their cards to build awareness to rapid interest increases.

Batch mode allows users too see what amounts need to be paid within a desired twelve month timeline in order to pay off card completely within desired month range. Every month interest is recalculated based on prior months payments.

Priority mode allows the user to focus their assets on a specific credit card by applying a monthly payment amount to view what their statement will be following a years timeline. This option helps users focus their budget on a card that may have higher rate of interest or one that may not be part of a promotional balance.

The red line on each graph is designed to help the user keep track of how much overall interest they have built up. Every month the interest is stacked showing the user the comparison between statement balance and total interest accrued.
